attributes.action: Carry out a proper vote in the Commons on Lords Reform - not STV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal byt the Leader of the House Jack Straw to inroduce STV voting for the isue of Lords Reform is an insiduous insult to Parliamentary democracy. If such an innovation is to be introduced, it should tself first be subject to a simple division in the traditional way.
